marketGroupName: {{ optional - if informed it will only import packages from & to the specified one (case sensitive) }}

availabilityDate.effectiveDate: {{ optional - if informed it will set the availability date in the destination branch for the Xvc and Uwp packages (if any) }}

mandatoryDate.effectiveDate: {{ optional - if informed it will set the mandatory date in the destination branch for the Uwp packages (if any) }}

aadAuthInfo.clientId: {{ required when using authentication method *AppCert* or *AppSecret* }}
aadAuthInfo.tenantId: {{ required when using authentication method *AppCert* or *AppSecret* }}
